feed.title: RSS Translator Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for RSS Translator: 2024.6.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • update sponsor logo by @versun in https://github.com/rss-translator/RSS-Translator/pull/76
  • [docs] update table style by @versun in https://github.com/rss-translator/RSS-Translator/pull/77
  • 修正日志中翻译结果的显示 by @libukai in https://github.com/rss-translator/RSS-Translator/pull/78
  • format code by ruff by @versun in https://github.com/rss-translator/RSS-Translator/pull/81
  • update docs by @versun in https://github.com/rss-translator/RSS-Translator/pull/83
  • add freetranslators by @versun in https://github.com/rss-translator/RSS-Translator/pull/84

New Contributors

  • @libukai made their first contribution in https://github.com/rss-translator/RSS-Translator/pull/78

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rss-translator/RSS-Translator/compare/2024.5.22...2024.6.19

entry.title: New release for RSS Translator: 2024.6.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: add freetranslator by @versun in https://github.com/rss-translator/RSS-Translator/pull/85
  • feat: update free translator
  • feat: detect and set source language for translation

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rss-translator/RSS-Translator/compare/2024.6.19...2024.6.20

entry.title: New release for RSS Translator: 2024.6.24
entry.content:
• docs: change website to docs
  • feat: update error logging in OpenAIInterface
  • feat: fix finish_reason check in translator engines
  • fix: handle missing category in OPML export
  • feat: improve OPML export functionality with error handling

entry.title: New release for RSS Translator: 2024.6.27
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: change translation title default to false and enhance OpenAI interface headers by @versun in https://github.com/rss-translator/RSS-Translator/pull/89
  • security update

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rss-translator/RSS-Translator/compare/2024.6.23...2024.6.27
